''character kit''' or simply '''kit''' was an optional additional layer in character creation used in [[2nd edition]], allowing for a variety of subtypes within the usual character classes. Each kit provided a specific role and a set of requirements, limitations and benefits to give a character its own twist. Usually, these kits where specific to a character class.

The variation from the standard class a kit provided ranged from slight to very profound.<ref><ref>

The [[Al-Qadim]] campaign required a kit for every character.
